contentrichtext.text: The '''ZF 5HP19''' is a five-speed [[automatic transmission]] for [[automobile|passenger cars]] from [[ZF Friedrichshafen|ZF Friedrichshafen AG]]. Introduced in 1996, it is still in production, and has been used in a variety of cars from [[Audi]], [[BMW]], [[Porsche]], and [[Volkswagen|Volkswagen Passenger Cars]]. ==Applications== ===5HP19=== [[BMW]] — [[longitudinal engine]], [[rear wheel drive]] *2001–2003 [[BMW E46]] 330Ci M54/B30 *2001–2003 [[BMW E46]] 330i M54/B30 *2000–2003 [[BMW E46]] 320i M52tu/B20 *2000– [[BMW E46]] 323Ci *2000– [[BMW E46]] 323i *2000– [[BMW E46]] 328i *2000– [[BMW E38]] 728i *2001–2003 [[BMW E46]] 325Ci M54/B25 *2001–2003 [[BMW E46]] 325i M54/B25 *2001–2003 [[BMW E39]] 525i M54/B25 *2001–2002 [[BMW E39]] 530i M54/B30 *2002–2003 [[BMW Z4]] 2.5i *2002–2003 [[BMW Z4]] 3.0i ===5HP19FL=== [[Porsche]] — [[longitudinal engine]] [[transaxle]] *1996–2003 [[Porsche Boxster]] 986 2.5 and 2.7 6-cyl *1999–2003 [[Porsche Boxster]] S 986 3.2 [[Volkswagen Group]] — [[longitudinal engine]] [[transaxle]], [[front-wheel drive]] *1996–2001 [[Audi A4#B5|Audi A4 (B5)]] 2.8 [[V6 engine|V6]] *1997–2003 Audi A4 (B5) 1.8T *1997–1999 [[Audi A8#D2|Audi A8 (D2)]] 3.7 [[V8 engine|V8]] *1998–2001 [[Audi A6#C5|Audi A6 (C5)]] 2.8 V6 *1998–2003 [[Volkswagen Passat]] GLS 1.8T *1998–2003 [[Volkswagen Passat]] GLS 2.8 V6 *1998–2003 [[Volkswagen Passat]] GLX 2.8 V6 *2003– [[Volkswagen Passat]] GL 1.8T ===5HP19FLA=== [[Volkswagen Group]] — [[longitudinal engine]], [[transaxle]] permanent [[four-wheel drive]] *1996–2001 [[Audi A4#B5|Audi A4 (B5)]] 2.8 V6 [[quattro (four wheel drive system)|quattro]] *1997–2001 [[Audi S4#B5|Audi S4 (B5)]] 2.7 V6 [[twin-turbo|'biturbo']] quattro *1997–2003 Audi A4 (B5) and [[Audi A4#B6|Audi A4 (B6)]] 1.8 T quattro *1998–2001 [[Audi A6#C5|Audi A6 (C5)]] 2.8 V6 quattro *2000–2003 [[Audi A6]] 2.7 V6 biturbo quattro *2000–2003 [[Volkswagen Passat]] GLS V6 [[4motion]] 2.8 V6 *2000–2003 [[Volkswagen Passat]] GLX V6 4motion 2.8 V6 *2004-2005 [[Volkswagen Passat]] GLS 4motion 1.8T *2001–2003 [[Audi A6 allroad quattro#C5|Audi allroad quattro]] 2.7 V6 biturbo *2002–2003 Audi A4 (B6) 3.0 V6 quattro *2002–2003 Audi A6 (C5) 3.0 V6 quattro *2002–2003 [[Volkswagen Passat]] 4.0 W8 4motion ===5HP19HL=== [[Porsche]] — [[longitudinal engine]] [[RR layout|rear engine]] [[transaxle]] *1998–2003 [[Porsche 911]] Carrera 996 3.4 *2002–2003 [[Porsche 911]] Targa 996 3.4 ===5HP19HLA=== [[Porsche]] — [[longitudinal engine]] [[RR layout|rear engine]] [[transaxle]]
